faqs.question: Apa itu Gloxus?
faqs.answer: Gloxus adalah sebuah SaaS platform yang dibangun dengan tujuan untuk mengoptimikasi proses perekrutan pekerja yang berfokus pada personalisasi hiring experience.

faqs.question: Bagaimana Gloxus memperbarui hiring experience?
faqs.answer: Platform kami merubah proses digital hiring dari sistematik ke personalized experience. Kami berusaha untuk menyediakan platform dimana perusahaan dan kandidate bisa saling mengerti tentang kebutuhan mereka masing-masing. Dengan demikian proses rekrutmne akan menjadi lebih baik dan cocok untuk semua pihak.

faqs.question: Apa saja layanan Gloxus?
faqs.answer: Gloxus memberikan banyak layanan dari Foreign Hiring Consultancy untuk perusahaan Jepang, Hiring Experience Platform dan Jasa pencarian Special Skilled Worker di Indonesia untuk di bekerja di Jepang.

faqs.question: Bagaimana cara daftar dan mulai menggunakan Gloxus?
faqs.answer: Untuk Hiring Experience Platform kami masih ada di tahap development, untuk cara bergabung ke piloting program kami atau ingin tanya-tanya, kalian bisa kirim email ke info@gloxus.jp.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using Gloxus?
faqs.answer: Japanese companies, start-ups, and foreign businesses operating in Japan can all benefit from Gloxus by streamlining their recruitment processes, ensuring cultural fit, and enhancing overall hiring efficiency.

faqs.question: Can Gloxus be customized for specific company needs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Gloxus offers customizable solutions to meet the unique needs of each company, ensuring the platform serves your specific recruitment requirements effectively.

faqs.question: How does Gloxus ensure a candidate's cultural fit?
faqs.answer: Through our cultural fit consulting service, we assess candidates' compatibility with your company's culture and values, ensuring a harmonious match that promotes productivity and job satisfaction.

faqs.question: What support does Gloxus offer to its users?
faqs.answer: Gloxus provides comprehensive support, including technical assistance, user training, and consultancy on recruitment strategies to ensure you get the most out of our platform.

faqs.question: What is the Gloxus piloting program?
faqs.answer: The Gloxus piloting program allows selected companies to use our platform on a trial basis, providing feedback to help us refine our services and ensuring the platform meets your recruitment needs effectively.

faqs.question: How long does the piloting program last?
faqs.answer: The duration of the piloting program varies, but typically it lasts between 3 to 6 months, allowing ample time to evaluate the platform's impact on your recruitment process.

faqs.question: Are there any costs involved in the piloting program?
faqs.answer: The piloting program is offered at a reduced cost or, in some cases, free of charge, with the aim of gathering valuable user feedback and demonstrating the platform's benefits to potential customers.

faqs.question: How can I provide feedback during the piloting program?
faqs.answer: Participants in the piloting program are encouraged to provide regular feedback through surveys, interviews, and direct communication with our support and development teams.

faqs.question: What happens after the piloting program ends?
faqs.answer: After the piloting program, companies can choose to continue using Gloxus by subscribing to one of our plans, tailored to fit various business sizes and needs.
